title: Please Ban this Player from Oceania Server Permanently
body:
This player entered the game from 0:00 and walked down mid purposely feeding. He did not speak during the champion selection nor throughout the game - but just started walking down middle lane endlessly.

His match history shows that he has been repeating this for the past 20 or so games.

Please ban his account permanently to  protect the league of legend community in Oceania server.

LINK TO IN GAME SCREENSHOT : 
1. https://40.media.tumblr.com/11f908e66fa8ecc6b3a6317974b786e1/tumblr_nr4831cjoM1qan3fqo4_1280.jpg

Cheers
